flawed_nl_solution:
She has gotten 70 haircuts to get 5 free ones because 14 x 5 = <<70=70>>70
She has gotten 9 haircuts towards her 6th free one because 14 - 5 = <<14-5=9>>9
She has gotten 81 haircuts because 70 + 9 = <<70+9=81>>81

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 79, not 81. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
